description.en_us: Get world seed without op permission.
description.zh_cn: 在没有op权限的情况下获取种子

introduction.en_us:
!!seed to get world seed.
\
You don't need to manually specify the seed in the configuration file, the plugin can obtain it automatically.
![image](https://github.com/OptiJava/PluginCatalogue/assets/106148777/06bf6739-3a44-4b5c-870f-27dc18a512db)
introduction.zh_cn:
!!seed指令获取服务器种子，无需手动在配置文件中指定种子，插件可以自动获取
![image](https://github.com/OptiJava/PluginCatalogue/assets/106148777/808b9702-77a0-40f4-873d-e6dab9d7790d)
